Texts.Chs: 把^orange;熔火核心^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Molten Core^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这就是我想要的，谢谢你！...呃，那很古怪。现在没有任何来自^green;永冻废墟附近的实验室^reset;的讯号。我想知道我的朋友是否遭遇了什么？
Texts.Eng: That did it, thanks!...hmm, that's odd. No signal from the ^green;lab on Delta Freya II^reset;. I wonder if my friend is okay?

Texts.Chs: 你问我有什么苦恼的？我正尝试使用这个设备，但是它竟然短路了。现在我迫切地需要一个^orange;熔火核心^reset;，你可以帮我吗？你可以在^orange;物质汇编机^reset;里面找到它。
Texts.Eng: Why am I up here? I'm trying to use this relay, but the damned thing is shorted out. I desperately need to reach a friend. Could you perhaps craft a ^orange;Molten Core^reset; in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;? That should fix it right up.
